about_the_game:
Miss Stick Games? No worries we got you! Come and play Stick Bros and Let's go back to the good old time!

Game Features

Customize your own stickman with cool items you can buy in ingame-marketplace or Trade items and become rich There's more come and see!

Endless Runner

Jump and avoid the obstacle and run as far as you want and be No.1 Score in leaderboard! You can obtain some stats like EXP by jumping on boxes will give you EXPs! Your Highscores will be recorded and will shown in leaderboards

Marketplace

This is where you connect with other online players and interact with them by Trading your items with better items on Marketplace with online players also other than that marketplace has some features like
  • Chatting and having fun with them
  • Bunch of Events ongoing in marketplace such as platinum spawn, event spawn

name: Stick Bros

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Pentium4 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
